name: Inflict Critical Wounds
text: This spell functions like inflict light wounds, except that you deal 4d8 points of damage + 1 point per caster level (maximum +20).
mythicText: The damage dealt increases to 8d8 points of damage + 2 points per caster level (maximum +40). A living target is sickened for 1 round per caster level (maximum 20 rounds) if it fails its saving throw.
savingThrow_zh: 意志, 通过则减半; 见文本
text_zh: 该法术的功能如同‘造成轻伤 (inflict light wounds)’一般，不过你能造成 {4d8+CL (最高+20)} 点伤害。
mythicText_zh: 法术造成的伤害增加至8d8 + 每施法者等级2点（最高+40）。若目标为活物且豁免失败的话，则会恶心（sickened），持续每施法者等级1轮（最高20轮）。
